reviewText: Jessie Gruman, Ph. D., has written an essential reference for just about everyone. She offers a well-informed cushion and roadmap to support what most of us will face quite unprepared--the shock of learning that you or someone you love has a bad diagnosis. Gruman has been there--she's had 4 serious illnesses, including 3 different cancers. She has brought her own personal experience and her extensive professional knowledge together in a very accessible reference. Notice how engaged Charlie Rose becomes from the get-go in his interview with her, due to his own health issues. Don't wait until you get the bad news, and you are in shock. Watch this interview and then buy this book now. AfterShock: What to Do When the Doctor Gives You--Or Someone You Love--a Devastating Diagnosis
